title: UPDATE: Elisa Longo Borghini out — Giro d’Italia stage 5: Antonia Niedermaier holds off Annemiek van Vleuten
content:
Elisa Longo Borghini slips off podium after late crash, Niedermaier moves up to second.

Read the full article at UPDATE: Elisa Longo Borghini out — Giro d’Italia stage 5: Antonia Niedermaier holds off Annemiek van Vleuten on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
